content: Xin Huang - Hong Kong Baptist University Xin Huang Associate Professor Coordinator of Research Postgraduate Programme (PhD&MPhil) Coordinator of Programming Contest Teams Department of Computer Science Hong Kong Baptist University [Bio] [DB Group] Office Hours: DLB635, 3-5 pm on Tuesdays Email: xinhuang at comp.hkbu.edu.hk My research centers on developing innovative technologies and theories of data science, particularly at the large-scale graph data. Graph Data Management (Keyword Search, Graph Indexing, Graph Query Processing) Graph Mining (Graph Summarization and Visualization, Graph Decomposition, Graph Clustering, Node Ranking) Community Search [Tutorial] [Demo] [Code] [Data] [Survey] [Book] Public-Private Graph Analytics [Data] Graph Learning (Graph Neural Networks, Generative Graph Analytics) [Open Positions] I am looking for PhD students, research assistants, and postdocs. Please send me your CV, if you are interested. News [05/2025]: We organized the IEEE ICDE 2025 Workshop on Frontiers of Data Engineering and AI (FEDA).
